actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) slashing damage.

special_abilities.name: Keen Senses
special_abilities.desc: The snow cat has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight, hearing, or smell.

special_abilities.name: Stalker
special_abilities.desc: If the snow cat surprises a creature and hits it with a bite attack, the target is grappled (escape DC 12) if it is a Medium or smaller creature.

special_abilities.name: Snow Camouflage
special_abilities.desc: The snow cat has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made to hide in snowy terrain.
